item.description:
Jin Shin Jyutsu:  Harmoninzing the Life Energy in the Body

with Betsy Barlow

 

Jin Shin Jyutsu is a healing art that brings balance to the body’s energies, which promote optimal health and well being, and facilitates our own innate healing capacity. It is a valuable complement to conventional healing methods, inducing relaxation and reducing the effects of stress. It involves the gentle placement of the hands or fingertips for harmonizing the flow of life energy, or chi, in the body, and encourages greater awareness of harmony within the self and the universe.

 

 

We begin our meeting with a potluck lunch from 11:30 - 12:15 and the speaker begins to present at 12:15 pm.

 

RSVP with what you'll bring to the potluck.

 

$10 meetup fee.
item.how_to_find_us: I will welcome you at the door
item.name: April Boston Area Mind-Body Therapies Meetup: Jin Shin Jyutsu with Betsy Barlow
